snippet.title: Why Amber Heard Donated $7 Million Divorce Settlement From Johnny Depp
snippet.description: Amber Heard is giving away every cent of her $7 million divorce settlement. The actress, who filed for divorce from Johnny Depp, said she is giving half the money to the American Civil Liberties Union for its violence against women campaign. The other half will go to the Children's Hospital of Los Angeles. In a statement, she said: "Money played no role for me personally and never has, except to the extent that I could donate it to charity and, in doing so, hopefully help those less able to defend themselves." #InsideEdition
tags: johnny depp & amber heard divorce reason
